Class Application

java.lang.Object
BTO.Application
All Implemented Interfaces:
Search<Integer>
public class Application extends Object implements Search<Integer>
Represents an application in the BTO system. This class handles both BTO housing applications and officer applications. Each application tracks the user who applied, the BTO project associated with the application, the type of application (e.g., "bto" or "officer"), and its current status. Applications are uniquely identified using an auto-incremented ID. Implements Search to support filtered access by application ID, BTO ID, or user ID.
Author:
Kah Teck, Keanan, Javier, Junnoske, Kevin

  • Constructor Details

    • Application

      public Application(Users applicant, int btoId, String status, String type)
      Constructs an officer application.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the user applying to be an officer
      btoId - the ID of the BTO project the user is applying to
      status - the initial status of the application
      type - the type of the application (should be "officer")

    • Application

      public Application(Users applicant, int btoId, int roomType)
      Constructs a BTO flat application.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the user applying for the BTO flat
      btoId - the ID of the BTO project
      roomType - the room type requested (2 or 3)
